name: A ascensão da amazona
description: This is a prototype of a game in development for graduation of digital games, without the applied art, the intention is the test of the feelings that the movement of the character transmits, after playing, it will be of great help if you answer the form in the link (https://goo.gl/2uj3Rz , Portuguese Version) (https://goo.gl/EuEo7u , English Version )to help with feedback and development.
